name: Threat Inquiry Pipeline
description: 9-phase AI pipeline that automates the full threat inquiry lifecycle: understanding email context, researching across internal and external sources, enriching IOCs, verifying detection coverage, drafting analyst responses, generating visual assets, and publishing documentation — all autonomously within minutes.
impact: Reduced threat inquiry response time from 2+ hours to under 15 minutes — 8x faster turnaround for customer-facing security advisories
